# product

**Instance Property**

The product information of the In-App Purchase the customer selects to purchase outside of the app.

## Declaration

```swift
let product: Product
```

## Discussion

To enable users to complete the purchase they start on the App Store, call [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/purchase(options:)] on this product instance.

## Identifying the product

- **id**: The product identifier of the In-App Purchase that the customer selects to purchase outside of the app.
